Text.Page:
With the shortages the hyenas left, we'll all starve to death while we wait for the supplies from Tulufan to get here.

Time to get clever. Our scouts have discovered a garden of fragrant roses in the northern wasteland. They produce a bitter fruit—rosehips, they're called—tastes like a sand lizard's leavings, but it's nutritious. If you could gather some of the fruit up while I see about that supply caravan, I'd be grateful.
Ugh! "Sand lizard's leavings" was being generous! But these should keep us from going hungry in the next few days. If nothing else, they'll curb your appetite.
You're a long way off from your quota! Please go back and gather more!
